authorizeTransactionWithFallback(Transaction) - Method in class org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.controller.TransactionController
Authorizes a transaction with fallback to the CASH category if the MCC cannot be mapped or if the balance of the mapped category is not sufficient.
authorizeTransactionWithFallback(Transaction) - Method in class org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service.TransactionService
